tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE building_info (
    building_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_name VARCHAR(50),
    address VARCHAR(100),
    total_area FLOAT,
    construction_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyOptimization (
    optimization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_id INT NOT NULL,
    optimization_date DATE NOT NULL,
    optimization_details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES BuildingInformation(building_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SensorData (
   sensor_id INT,
   building_id INT,
   sensor_type VARCHAR,
   reading DECIMAL,
   timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE meter_data (
    meter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_id INT NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    time TIME NOT NULL,
    consumption DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES building_info(building_id)
);

CREATE TABLE building_energy_sources (
    building_id INT NOT NULL,
    source_id INT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (building_id, source_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES building_info(building_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES energy_sources(source_id)
);
